issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Received this email through JIRA admin account:

_In Android when using the Picker element we are receiving the following warning:"PickerProxy: the useSpinner property is deprecated, see the documentation for more information". At any time we are establishing this property and it is causing the application to freeze_

I reached out to the app developer for more details, and will update the ticket after information is available.
fields.summary: Android: Warning: "PickerProxy: the useSpinner property is deprecated"

comments.body: Already opened by that user as an own ticket: AC-5734
